SELECT r.id, r.floor_id, r.building_id, r.classroom_code, r.remark, b.building_name AS buildingName, f.floor_number AS floorName FROM room r LEFT JOIN building b ON r.building_id = b.id AND b.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN floor f ON r.floor_id = f.id AND f.is_deleted = 0
AND r.is_deleted = 0
AND classroom_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryParams.classroomCode}, '%')
AND floor_id = #{queryParams.floorId}
